tool_description: This is an api platform for razorcloud live app owners.
name: Razor Live App
title: Razor Live App

api_list.name: Movie List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://razor-live-app.p.rapidapi.com/getmovie.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "razor-live-app.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
